sn20.11:4.2: “Mendicants, did you hear an old jackal howling as the night faded?”
sn20.11:4.4: “That old jackal has the disease called mange.
sn20.11:4.5: Yet it still goes where it wants,
sn20.11:4.8: and lies down where it wants.
sn20.11:4.9: And the cool breeze still blows on it.
sn20.11:4.10: A certain person here who claims to be a follower of the Sakyan son would be lucky to experience even such an incarnation.
sn20.11:4.11: So you should train like this:
